title: Dhaka Heritage Enthusiast
reason: I'm passionate about the rich history of Old Dhaka and love walking tourists through Mughal-era architecture and food streets.

title: Dhaka Heritage Enthusiast
reason: I'm passionate about the rich history of Old Dhaka and love walking tourists through Mughal-era architecture and food streets.

title: Paharpur & Mahasthangarh Archaeology Tour
description: Step back into history with guided tours to Paharpur Buddhist Monastery and Mahasthangarh ruins in North Bengal.

tourPlan.activities: Train to Bogura, visit Mahasthangarh ancient city ruins
Travel to Paharpur, explore UNESCO heritage site
Visit local museum, return by train

title: Saint Martin's Coral Island Adventure
description: Crystal blue waters, coral reefs, and beach bonfires await on Bangladesh's only coral island. Ideal for snorkeling and sunset lovers.
